linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or Latest Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Processor 64-bit quad core 1.6 Ghz (CPU or APU)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or Latest Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: Processor 64-bit quad core 1.6 Ghz (CPU or APU)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
